rev.desc.rev.desc: Unable to create reports with the OOB Report Writer
init $dbdict in panel init.variables
$L.void=rtecall("rinit", "", $dbdict, "dbdict")
CM Reports - Run Device Trace - Detail - fails to report any information on down device
using "application" instead of " report.name" in the "ck.for.rpt.appl.2" panel
CM Reports - Run Device Trace - Detail - fails to report any information on down devices
add init application panel , avoid close abnormal when the "application" field in the report file is empty
Fixed last change where $report was not yet initialized. Move statement to after the rinit panel.
Added the following process line to the start panel:
$L.rptque.qry="report.name=\""+str(report.name in $report)+"\" and operator.name=\""+operator()+"\""
Changed the query on the select.operator panel to:
$L.rptque.qry
modified the message panel for invalid filename. Made it a pop-up so it requires the user to click OK to get rid of the message.
Also modified the set.new.rpt.defaults panel to populate the primary.filename field even when there is no '.' in the name or if there is a space
added calls to format control for both the addition and updates of reports.
Case insensitivity problem fixes.
Replaced qbe panel with genquery.
changed to use sorting code in display.
Added sorting to qbe list.
scmsg
Modified format.utility to set $rwf to the detail format if the cursor isn't already pointing to a format.
